org.jruyi.io

Class StringCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jruyi.io.StringCodec

  • public final class StringCodec
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a factory class for string codecs.
    Since:
    2.0
    See Also:
    Codec, ShortArrayCodec, IntArrayCodec, LongArrayCodec, FloatArrayCodec, DoubleArrayCodec, CharArrayCodec, CharSequenceCodec

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  StringCodec.IStringCodecProvider
      This interface defines all the methods that a string codec provider has to implement.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ICodec<java.lang.String> charset(java.lang.String charsetName)
      Returns a codec to encode/decode string in the specified charset.
      static ICodec<java.lang.String> iso_8859_1()
      Returns an iso-8859-1 string codec.
      static ICodec<java.lang.String> us_ascii()
      Returns a us-ascii string codec.
      static ICodec<java.lang.String> utf_16()
      Returns a utf-16 string codec.
      static ICodec<java.lang.String> utf_16be()
      Returns a utf-16be string codec.
      static ICodec<java.lang.String> utf_16le()
      Returns a utf-16le string codec.
      static ICodec<java.lang.String> utf_8()
      Returns a utf-8 string codec.
